entry.title: Abyss
entry.value: A glowing light ahead draws you towards it. Make a Luck (-1) check. If you pass, the glow is a way home. Return to Arkham. If you fail, the light is a trap set by one of the monsters that lives here. A monster appears!

entry.title: Celeano
entry.value: That's it! That's the document you need! Quietly, you reach for it, trying not to disturb its guardian. Make a Sneak (-2) check. If you pass, search the Spell deck and take 1 Spell of your choice. If you fail, lose 2 Stamina.

entry.title: Other
entry.value: Pass a Fight (-1) check to hang on to your prize despite the wind. Draw 1 Spell.

entry.title: Abyss
entry.value: The feeble glow and warmth of the candle is enough to restore you a bit. Gain 1 Stamina.

entry.title: Yuggoth
entry.value: The creature's grip is like steel! Pass a Fight (-2) check to break free and escapre. If you fail, the creature's grip tightens with a sickening pop. You are lost in time and space.

entry.title: Other
entry.value: You've completed your task, but now you must escapre before the portal closes! Pass a Speed (-2) check to return to Arkham. If you fail, you are lost in time and space. In either event you automatically close the gate you entered through.

entry.title: Abyss
entry.value: You are bewildered. Pass a Lore (-1) check or stay here next turn.

entry.title: Yuggoth
entry.value: Pass a Sneak (-1) check or the creatures capture and experiment on you. Lose half of your items, then immediately return to Arkham with no memory of the experiments.

entry.title: Other
entry.value: The insanity of this place finally hits you. Lose 1 Sanity.

entry.title: Abyss
entry.value:
The caverns split. Make a Luck (+1) check and consult the chart below:
Successes:
0-1: Move to the Black Cave.
2: Move to The Dreamlands.
3+: You enter a dark temple. Pass a Luck (-1) check to draw a Unique Item.

entry.title: Celeano
entry.value: The huge book opens noiselessly at your approach. If you choose, you may read it, in which case you must pass a Fight (-1) [2] check to defeat its guardian. If you do, draw 3 Spells and keep 2 of them. If you fail, lose 3 Stamina.

entry.title: Other
entry.value: A monster appears!

entry.title: The Dreamlands
entry.value: You wanter the frozen wastes. No encounter.

entry.title: Abyss
entry.value: You rest a bit beside a small, glowing pool filled with black, blind fish. Pass a Luck (-1) check to notice an unusual object in the water. Fishing it out, you draw 1 Unique Item and gain $3.

entry.title: Other
entry.value: Pass a Luck (-1) check to discover a cache of ancient papers containing valuable information about the Mythos. Gain 1 Clue token for every success you rolled on your Luck check.

entry.title: The Dreamlands
entry.value: As you are climbing the cliffs in the underworld, your pocket gets caught and tears open. Pass a Speed (-1) check or lose all your money.

entry.title: Celeano
entry.value: As you read the page, you realize you have stumbled into a written trap. Pass a Lore (-1) check or you are Cursed.

entry.title: Other
entry.value: A hideous monster appears.

entry.title: The Dreamlands
entry.value: At the south gates of Thran, you are stopped by a red-robed sentry until you can tell three dreams beyond belief. Pass a Luck (-1) check to tour the golden spires of Thran, gaining 2 Clue tokens in the process. If you fail, stay here next turn.

entry.title: Celeano
entry.value: The symbol above the doorway glows. Make a Luck (-1) check. If you pass, gain 2 Stamina and 2 Sanity. If you fail, discard 2 items of your choice.

entry.title: Other
entry.value: Pass a Fight (-2) check to lever back the lid of the stone chest. Inside, you find $8. If you fail, lose 1 Stamina.

entry.title: The Dreamlands
entry.value: Pass a Lore (+0) check to fight off your desire to sleep. If you fail, you freeze in the night. You are lost in time and space. If you succeed, return to Arkham.

entry.title: Yuggoth
entry.value: The stone creature pursues you. Pass a Speed (-1) check to escapre with the statue, gaining $5 and 2 Clue tokens. If you fail, the creature smashes you off the cliff. You are lost in time and space.

entry.title: Other
entry.value: Luck is with you. You stumble on a cache of supplies. Draw 1 Common Item.

entry.title: The Dreamlands
entry.value: A thief attempts to rob you. Pass a Sneak (+0) check to notice him. If you fail, lose half your items (your choice) and half your money (rounded up).

entry.title: Yuggoth
entry.value: You're dizzy from the strange ray. Pass a Will (-2) check or lose 1 item of your choice.

entry.title: Other
entry.value: The strain is too much for your mind. Lose 1 Sanity.

entry.title: The Dreamlands
entry.value: You drink impure water from the River Kra. Pass a Luck (-1) check or lose 1 Stamina and stay here next turn due to illness.

entry.title: Abyss
entry.value: You are lost in the darkness. Pass a Luck (-2) check or lose 1 Sanity and stay here next turn.

entry.title: Other
entry.value: You are lost in a labyrinth of high walls. Pass a Lore (-1) check or stay here next turn.

entry.title: Yuggoth
entry.value: A monster appears from the darkness!

entry.title: Celeano
entry.value: Pass a Luck (-1) check or the book is a prison. If you fail, roll a die. On a failure, a monster appears from the book. On a success, you are drawn into the book for a time. Stay here next turn.

entry.title: Other
entry.value: Pass a Luck (-1) check to find something to defend yourself with. Take the first Weapon from the Common Item deck.

entry.title: Yuggoth
entry.value: Exposure and fear weaken your mind. Pass a Will (-2) check or you must either lose 2 Spells of your choice or lose 2 Sanity.

entry.title: Celeano
entry.value: A lurking monster appears!

entry.title: Other
entry.value: Monsters lurk everywhere. Pass a Sneak (-2) check or stay here next turn.

entry.title: City of the Great Race
entry.value: You must have that device if you are to escape from this accursed city. Pass a Sneak (-1) [2] check to draw 1 Unique Item and return to Arkham. If you fail, your captors are none too kind. Lose 3 Sanity and 1 Stamina.

entry.title: Plateau of Leng
entry.value: The hooved, wide-mouthed traders of this land are wealthy, but dangerous. You may make a Lore (-2) check to trade with them. If you pass, gain $6. If you fail, you are lost in time and space.

entry.title: Other
entry.value: Pass a Luck (-1) check to discover a vital document. Gain 2 Clue tokens.

entry.title: City of the Great Race
entry.value: You find yourself in an ancient and abandoned temple. Pass a Luck (-1) check to find a golden statue worth $10. However if you take it, you are Cursed.

entry.title: Celeano
entry.value: Your red-eyed reflection in the mirror captures your attention. Stay here next turn.

entry.title: Other
entry.value: The rope seems to extend upwards forever, but its the only way out of the crevasse you find yourself in. Pass a Fight (-1) check to climb it and return to Arkham. If you fail, you fall, losing 2 Stamina and staying here next turn.

entry.title: City of the Great Race
entry.value: The conical entity tries to teach you some magic. Pass a Lore (-2) [2] check to draw 2 Spells.

entry.title: Celeano
entry.value: You find secret lore hidden in the mosaics on the wall. Make a Lore (+2) check and gain Clue tokens equal to your successes.

entry.title: Other
entry.value: You find some valuable items that you can sell back in Arkham. Gain $3.

entry.title: Plateau of Leng
entry.value: You wander the frozen wastes. No encounter.

entry.title: Celeano
entry.value: An old professor from Earth teaches you a thing or two. Pass a Luck (-1) [2] check to draw 1 Skill.

entry.title: Other
entry.value: You come across a sleeping horror with a tentacle draped across a small gold idol. Silence is of the essence as you attempt to gently ease the idol out from under the creature's pseudopod. Make a Sneak (-1) check. If you pass, gain $3. If you fail, lose 2 Stamina.

entry.title: Pleateau of Leng
entry.value: Your mind and body are toughened by your experiences. Pass a Will (+0) [2] check to draw 1 Skill.

entry.title: Celeano
entry.value: Pass a Luck (-2) check to find a valuable book. If so, search the Unique Item deck and take the first Tome you find.

entry.title: Other
entry.value: Wedged beneath a fallen stone is a scroll. Draw 1 Spell.
